医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
饮酒会增加乙型肝炎病毒感染者患肝硬化和肝癌的风险饮酒对乙型肝炎病毒 (HBV) 感染的肝硬化和肝细胞癌 (HCC) 的定量影响尚不清楚。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250116/Alcohol-conspiration-increases-risks-of-cirrosis-and-HCC-in-病人-with-HBV-infection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250116/Alcohol-conspiration-increases-risks-of-cirrosis-and-HCC-in-病人-with-HBV-infection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ceeec485-9b82-42ca-8bae-ccd244e3b3da Thu, 16 Jan 2025 13:17:19 -0500 Alcohol consumption increases risks of cirrhosis and HCC in patients with HBV infection
简短的认知行为干预有助于减少青少年的物质使用障碍简短的认知行为干预可以帮助年轻人管理其性格的各个方面，例如冲动、寻求感觉、绝望和焦虑敏感性，已被证明可以减少青少年的药物使用障碍。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250116/Brief-cognitive-behavioral-interventions-help-reduce-substance-use-disorders-in-teens.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250116/Brief-cognitive-behavioral-interventions-help-reduce-substance-use-disorders-in-teens.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=74340bd8-ecef-471c-8b88-7529bc9ead84 Thu, 16 Jan 2025 13:09:17 -0500 Brief cognitive behavioral interventions help reduce substance use disorders in teens
NCCN 的新资源为遗传性癌症风险提供指导今天，领先癌症中心联盟国家综合癌症网络 (NCCN) 发布了一项新资源，向人们通报有关遗传性和家族性癌症风险的最新建议。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250116/New-resource-from-NCCN-offers-guidance-on-hereditary-cancer-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250116/New-resource-from-NCCN-offers-guidance-on-hereditary-cancer-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=50433521-e846-483e-93bc-6f8399d13a22 Thu, 16 Jan 2025 13:04:55 -0500 New resource from NCCN offers guidance on hereditary cancer risk
硫酸鱼精蛋白可减少 dTRA 冠状动脉造影术后的加压时间宣布在《心血管创新与应用》杂志上发表新文章。通过远端经桡动脉入路（dTRA），术后加压时间仍然明显长于实践中推荐的范围。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250116/Protamine-sulfate-reduces-postoperative-compression-time-after-dTRA-coronary-angiography.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250116/Protamine-sulfate-reduces-postoperative-compression-time-after-dTRA-coronary-angiography.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b343275e-1653-4821-bde2-521e926de7a9 Thu, 16 Jan 2025 13:00:00 -0500 Protamine sulfate reduces postoperative compression time after dTRA coronary angiography
免疫系统的变化可能预测精神分裂症的抗精神病药物耐药性来自国家医疗保健集团 (NHG) 心理健康研究所 (IMH) 和科学技术研究局 (A*STAR) 的研究人员在了解精神分裂症患者免疫系统与抗精神病药物耐药性之间的关系方面取得了长足进步，利用免疫细胞群的变化来预测潜在的治疗耐药性并尽早开始最合适的治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250116/Immune-system-changes-may-predict-antipsychotic-resistance-in-schizophrenia-Scientis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250116/Immune-system-changes-may-predict-antipsychotic-resistance-in-schizophrenia-Scientis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=607ba6be-769b-41b5-b8d3-befd285eed2e Thu, 16 Jan 2025 12:43:25 -0500 Immune system changes may predict antipsychotic resistance in schizophrenia Scientis...
吡格列酮可能有助于预防沃纳综合征患者的疼痛性皮肤溃疡一篇新的研究论文发表在 Aging（MEDLINE/PubMed 列为“Aging (Albany NY)”，Web of Science 列为“Aging-US”）第 16 卷，第 22 期，2024 年 12 月 2 日，题为“Lessfrequent Skinulcers”在接受吡格列酮治疗的维尔纳综合征患者中：来自日本维尔纳综合征登记处的调查结果。” https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250116/Pioglitazone-may-help-prevent-painful-skin-ulcers-in-people-with-Werner-syndrome.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250116/Pioglitazone-may-help-prevent-painful-skin-ulcers-in-people-with-Werner-syndrome.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b2ba1a5d-e90e-4b10-91f4-ec288e470b1e Thu, 16 Jan 2025 12:39:13 -0500 Pioglitazone may help prevent painful skin ulcers in people with Werner syndrome
可穿戴设备可以识别和预测炎症性肠病的发作西奈山研究人员在一项首个此类研究中证明，可穿戴设备可以识别、区分和预测炎症性肠病 (IBD) 的发作或症状和炎症的恶化。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250116/Wearable-devices-can-identify-and-predict-flare-ups-in-炎症-bowel-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250116/Wearable-devices-can-identify-and-predict-flare-ups-in-炎症-bowel-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6e58e9f7-a97b-437a-a85e-f03d60bdbcf0 Thu, 16 Jan 2025 12:27:07 -0500 Wearable devices can identify and predict flare-ups in inflammatory bowel disease
研究人员发现骨肉瘤的主要驱动因素伦敦大学学院 (UCL)、欧洲分子生物学实验室 (EMBL) EBI 和皇家国家骨科医院的研究人员发现了骨癌骨肉瘤的主要驱动因素，提供了有助于预测癌症严重程度以及患者对治疗的反应的见解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250116/Researchers-discover-a-major-driver-of-osteosarcoma.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250116/Researchers-discover-a-major-driver-of-osteosarcoma.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6afba544-28b3-42a2-944c-19fc246981e2 Thu, 16 Jan 2025 12:19:00 -0500 Researchers discover a major driver of osteosarcoma
COVID-19 疫苗缺口与英国较高的住院率和死亡率有关根据第一项针对整个英国人口的 COVID-19 疫苗覆盖率的研究，到 2022 年夏季，英国四个国家中有三分之一到一半的人口没有接种建议数量的新冠疫苗和加强疫苗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250116/COVID-19-vaccine-gaps-linked-to-higher-hospitalization-and-death-rates-in-the-UK.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250116/COVID-19-vaccine-gaps-linked-to-higher-hospitalization-and-death-rates-in-the-UK.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4d4edc32-3702-4a70-ab4e-4dd4014f78f9 Thu, 16 Jan 2025 12:12:40 -0500 COVID-19 vaccine gaps linked to higher hospitalization and death rates in the UK
开发新的评分系统以表彰和奖励资深医生和牙医一组研究人员为一项全国性计划开发了一种新的评分系统，该计划由临床影响奖咨询委员会 (ACCIA) 监督，旨在表彰和奖励英格兰和威尔士的高级医生和牙医。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250116/New-scoring-system-development-to-recognize-and-reward-senior-doctors-and-dentists.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250116/New-scoring-system-development-to-recognize-and-reward-senior-doctors-and-dentists.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6e3f1a9b-2669-499e-a175-a7a680d19958 Thu, 16 Jan 2025 12:05:40 -0500
